actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Armed Services.

official_title: A bill to amend section 405 of title 37, US code, relating to the payment of a per diem with respect to dependents of certain members of the uniformed services while on duty outside the US.

summary.text: Provides for the payment of a per diem for travel and transporation to a member of the armed forces who is assigned to a duty station in a restricted area outside the United States if, in connection with the assignment, his dependents move to his legal residence and the residence is in Alaska, Hawaii, Puerto Rico, or a territory or possession of the United States. (Amends 37 U.S.C. 405)

titles.title: A bill to amend section 405 of title 37, US code, relating to the payment of a per diem with respect to dependents of certain members of the uniformed services while on duty outside the US.
